privacy.title: Privacy first
privacy.local: Your data stays local in your browser for now. If this changes, you'll need to consent first.
privacy.transparency: Transparency - When KARL sends emails or makes calls for you, we'll show you exactly what data is shared.
privacy.serious: We take privacy seriously – even though many AI providers unfortunately don't.

step1.title: Step 1: Schedule initial consultation
step1.subtitle: The easiest way to get a first consultation appointment
step1.description: At the appointment service center, you can easily get an appointment for an initial psychotherapeutic consultation. This consultation determines whether therapy is suitable for you.

online.title: Online appointment booking
online.info: Available by region • Direct appointment booking

important.title: Important for later cost reimbursement:
important.treatment: Treatment need must be determined by the therapist
important.required: On the "Individual Patient Information" must be checked: "Therapy urgently required"
important.only: Only then is a cost reimbursement procedure possible later

whatHappens.title: What happens in the initial consultation?
whatHappens.talk: Detailed conversation about your situation (approx. 50 minutes)
whatHappens.assessment: Assessment of whether psychotherapy makes sense
whatHappens.document: You receive an "Individual Patient Information" with urgency code

encouragement.title: You can do this!
encouragement.message: We at KARL wish you lots of strength and success in your search! The path may sometimes seem difficult, but every step brings you closer to the help you deserve.
encouragement.note: If you're unsure about some steps, feel free to use our therapist search or contact counseling centers in your area.
